About Us

Background

Research Tutorials and Surveys (RETS) is a training and consultancy company based in Nairobi, Kenya. We focus on developing research capacity, data analytics for decision making and team development in order to enhance organizational performance. Our commitment is to improve research skills and use data analytics for business transformation across all sectors of the economy. We work with various professionals to develop tailor-made innovative tools that successfully assist our clients achieve high and efficient business performance.

Our Purpose

  • Objective:To improve research skills in enhancing decision making for improved organizational performance.
  • Vision: To become the trusted research training and consultancy company in Africa.
  • Mission: We aspire to make RETS the best company focused on research capacity building, decision making, improving data visualization and team development.

What We Do

  • Thesis Writing Tutorials
  • Data Literacy for Managers
  • Team Development
  • Market Surveys
  • Data Visualization
